title: NO supourt
body:
So, I was playing a ranked game.
All was fine until I actually got into the game. I tried to disconnect so the whole team wouldn't lose lp so I did that. I tried fixing it with the resolution because it worked before but it didn't. multiple atempts and didn't work. My team probably lost and I hope that my whole team at about 4 clock at October 16th 2017 could just get that lp back. I didn't  know it was even broken and I feel like it wasn't fair to lose lp just because I didn't know how to fix this issue. I cant even come back to it anymore. Pls help

replies.body: I'm not sure I fully understand what issue you were having in the match that made you decide to try disconnecting. Let me know what was happening that made you try to leave the match early so I can toss you a couple troubleshooting steps.
